content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.paypalobjects.com https://*.google.com https://*.facebook.net https://*.facebook.com https://*.fbcdn.net https://*.twitter.com chrome-extension:// 'unsafe-eval'; img-src data: chrome-extension: https://*.gstatic.com https://*.facebook.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src https://*.google.com https://*.facebook.com https://facebook.com http://*.facebook.com http://*.twitter.com https://*.twitter.com chrome-extension://; object-src 'self'
